EmailTemplate.name: Incentive Program Submission Acknowledge static
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Successful enrollment in {!Incentive_Program_Enrollment__c.Incentive_Program__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Incentive_Program_Enrollment__c.Requester__c} ,
Thank you for your interest in the {!Incentive_Program_Enrollment__c.Incentive_Program__c}.
Per our records you are now opted in to participate in this Incentive. We wish you success in your selling efforts.
For your reference, please click on this link to login to MyNCR and access the Incentive program via Interact Program Tools.
Regards,
NCR Interact Partner Program Team
